description: This file defines a PatientModel class that provides data access methods for patient records in a healthcare appointment management system. It includes methods for creating, retrieving, listing, updating, and deleting patient records from a database.

classes.name: PatientModel
classes.description: A class encapsulating database operations related to patients, including create, findById, list, update, and remove methods.

methods.name: create({ name, place, date_of_birth, reason_for_visit, gender, assigned_doctor_id, fees_collected })
methods.description: Inserts a new patient record into the database and returns the created record.

methods.name: findById(id)
methods.description: Retrieves a patient record by its ID, including assigned doctor name.

methods.name: list({ q, doctorId, limit = 50, offset = 0 } = {})
methods.description: Retrieves a list of patients with optional search filtering by query string and doctor ID, supporting pagination.

methods.name: update(id, fields)
methods.description: Updates specified fields of a patient record identified by ID.

methods.name: remove(id)
methods.description: Deletes a patient record by ID.

ctags.name: create
ctags.pattern: /^  static async create({ name, place, date_of_birth, reason_for_visit, gender, assigned_doctor_id/
ctags.signature: ({ name, place, date_of_birth, reason_for_visit, gender, assigned_doctor_id, fees_collected })

ctags.name: list
ctags.pattern: /^  static async list({ q, doctorId, limit = 50, offset = 0 } = {}) {$/
